synopsis: A short anime that was aired on the official YouTube channel.
Handa and Naru talk about which characters will appear in the second episode of the anime.
Handa and Naru talk about the summary of episode 2 and about Tama's secret that will be revealed in episode 3.
Panchi makes appearance from episode 0, she talks with Naru and Handa about a terrifying character that will appear in fourth episode.
Miwa and Tama tell Handa about the first movie of Demon Geezer.
Handa and Naru talk about Kawafuji and the mysterious person who is coming to the island in sixth episode.
Kawafuji and Kanzaki are returning to Tokyo in the seventh episode.
Handa talks with Miwa and Tama about their future careers.
Naru sings about making her requests to Handa. She also tells him about a big crisis in ninth episode.
Panchi and Handa reenact a phone call lifeline from a popular game show. Also it is hinted that the tenth episode will be about a cultural festival.
Miwa, Tama and Kanzaki talk about what type of place Tokyo is. They hint that the eleventh episode will be focused on Tokyo.
Handa, Naru, Panchi, Miwa and Tamako talk about what might happen in series finale.
Handa, Naru, Miwa and Tama talk about the finale and thank viewers for watching the anime.
